Title: The spirit of Yan'an is passed on from generation to generation
Notes: An old peasant welcomes an "educated urban youth" sent to the countryside. In the background on the left a group of urban youth come marching, under a banner with the slogan "Warmly welcome the intellectual youth ..." - 热烈欢迎知识青..
Theme: Yan'anUp to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)
